title: When is Zyra getting deleted?
body:
This champ is beyond oppressive, requires absolutely minimal skill, and is just completely anti-fun to play against.

Zyra "support" out damages her entire team with just {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}}. 

Currently sitting at a 56% win rate, has 0 bad matchups, and is safe to blind pick. Completely unfair.
